content.raw:
The move/rotate gui tools are broken with dart 4.2.1. ~~Due to #1408, this must be tested with the gazebo_4.1 branch for now~~, gazebo_4.1 or gazebo5 can be used since #1408 is resolved.

The easiest way to replicate this is to run the `INTEGRATION_physics_msgs` test, which is currently failing.

~~~
[ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/PhysicsMsgsTest.MoveTool/3
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 172.23.2.90
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:144] ServerFixture load in 0.7 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
[Dbg] [physics_msgs.cc:110] SpawnBox called
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo3/src/gazebo/test/integration/physics_msgs.cc:157: Failure
Value of: model->GetWorldPose()
  Actual: 195.915 435.243 7.33874 0.1 -0.2 0.3
Expected: *iter
Which is: 123.456 456.123 50 0.1 -0.2 0.3
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo3/src/gazebo/test/integration/physics_msgs.cc:157: Failure
Value of: model->GetWorldPose()
  Actual: -266.077 403.441 -47.9663 0.2 0.4 -0.6
Expected: *iter
Which is: -123.456 456.123 50 0.2 0.4 -0.6
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo3/src/gazebo/test/integration/physics_msgs.cc:157: Failure
Value of: model->GetWorldPose()
  Actual: -85.4445 -459.931 166.812 0.3 -0.6 0.9
Expected: *iter
Which is: 123.456 -456.123 50 0.3 -0.6 0.9
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo3/src/gazebo/test/integration/physics_msgs.cc:157: Failure
Value of: model->GetWorldPose()
  Actual: 88.2556 -480.069 58.1481 -0.4 0.8 -1.2
Expected: *iter
Which is: -123.456 -456.123 50 -0.4 0.8 -1.2
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:95] ServerFixture::Unload
[  FAILED  ] PhysicsEngines/PhysicsMsgsTest.MoveTool/3, where GetParam() = "dart" (2669 ms)
~~~
~~~
[ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/PhysicsMsgsTest.LinkPose/3
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
[Msg] Publicized address: 172.23.2.90
[Wrn] [DARTPhysics.cc:93] Gravity vector is (0, 0, 0). Objects will float.
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:144] ServerFixture load in 0.7 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo3/src/gazebo/test/integration/physics_msgs.cc:374: Failure
Value of: link->GetRelativePose()
  Actual: 3.60656 5.1025 5 0 0 0
Expected: *iter
Which is: 5 0 5 0 0 0
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo3/src/gazebo/test/integration/physics_msgs.cc:374: Failure
Value of: link->GetRelativePose()
  Actual: -6.60156 7.4625 5 0 0 0
Expected: *iter
Which is: 0 8 5 0 0 0
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo3/src/gazebo/test/integration/physics_msgs.cc:374: Failure
Value of: link->GetRelativePose()
  Actual: -78.0985 -76.5375 5 0 0 0
Expected: *iter
Which is: -99 0 5 0 0 0
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo3/src/gazebo/test/integration/physics_msgs.cc:374: Failure
Value of: link->GetRelativePose()
  Actual: -784.537 786.017 5 0 0 0
Expected: *iter
Which is: 0 999 5 0 0 0
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo3/src/gazebo/test/integration/physics_msgs.cc:374: Failure
Value of: link->GetRelativePose()
  Actual: -180.111 476.829 -7.58844 0.1 -0.2 0.3
Expected: *iter
Which is: 123.456 456.123 50 0.1 -0.2 0.3
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo3/src/gazebo/test/integration/physics_msgs.cc:374: Failure
Value of: link->GetRelativePose()
  Actual: -575.973 122.91 -31.3878 0.2 0.4 -0.6
Expected: *iter
Which is: -123.456 456.123 50 0.2 0.4 -0.6
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo3/src/gazebo/test/integration/physics_msgs.cc:374: Failure
Value of: link->GetRelativePose()
  Actual: 241.144 -375.423 202.917 0.3 -0.6 0.9
Expected: *iter
Which is: 123.456 -456.123 50 0.3 -0.6 0.9
/home/scpeters/ws/gazebo3/src/gazebo/test/integration/physics_msgs.cc:374: Failure
Value of: link->GetRelativePose()
  Actual: 508.734 -354.825 -91.4859 -0.4 0.8 -1.2
Expected: *iter
Which is: -123.456 -456.123 50 -0.4 0.8 -1.2
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:95] ServerFixture::Unload
[  FAILED  ] PhysicsEngines/PhysicsMsgsTest.LinkPose/3, where GetParam() = "dart" (2243 ms)
~~~
@jlee02 @karenliu
content.html:
The move/rotate gui tools are broken with dart 4.2.1. Due to #1408, this must be tested with the gazebo_4.1 branch for now, gazebo_4.1 or gazebo5 can be used since #1408 is resolved.

The easiest way to replicate this is to run the INTEGRATION_physics_msgs test, which is currently failing.

[ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/PhysicsMsgsTest.MoveTool/3
[Msg] Waiting for master.
[Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
